name: City Bus Crazy Driving Simulator
description:
City Bus Crazy Driving Simulator

There are many bus routes to complete across the city. Take the passengers from the bus stops and drive them to their destinations in the other part of the big city.
user must have to park the car in some duration.so be careful,accurate and speedy to park a bus.
This game includes a 3D Models of different types of bus,hill and valley locations.
If you're a fan of the racing games, bus driving might feel a bit slow for you. It's the best bus simulator for all who like taxi games, bus parking and other passenger games.

Only this time you drive the city bus which is a big vehicle. Try out Bus Simulator - one of the best bus games of 2016 and become the best bus driver!
you can enjoy the exciting ride of City Bus Crazy Driving Simulator.
There are amazing 3d levels which u ll enjoy while playing.
Download one of the best 2016 bus games and enjoy bus driving. It's FREE!

key features:

- full 3D big city environment
- Adventurous levels
- multiple camera views
- Cool Sounds
- More levels Coming Soon
